sentences.en: A lot of teenagers develop acne.
Acne is very common among teenagers.
sentences.cn: 粉刺在青少年中间很常见.

sentences.en: Although it is predominantly a teenage problem, acne can occur in early childhood.
sentences.cn: 虽然粉刺多发于青少年时期，但也可能在刚进入童年时期就出现。

sentences.en: Application acne, acne, and the imprint left by the Depression.
sentences.cn: 粉刺 、 青春痘 、 及其留下的凹陷印痕.

sentences.en: Cystic acne usually results in deep pitting or scarring of the skin.
sentences.cn: 囊肿型痤疮往往导致皮肤凹陷或留下疤痕.

sentences.en: Doctors can treat acne with pills or creams.
sentences.cn: 医生可用药丸或药膏治疗粉刺.

sentences.en: Fit to oil skin, reduce acne. Clean air and make people stimulation.
sentences.cn: 适合油性肤质, 治疗粉刺、皮肤炎及毛孔阻塞. 激励精神,净化空气.

sentences.en: For oily skinskin, mixed skin, acne skin and comedo skin.
sentences.cn: 中性、油性 、 混合性皮肤 、 痤疮皮肤、黒头皮肤.

sentences.en: He had terrible acne when he was younger.
sentences.cn: 他年轻时长粉刺很厉害.

sentences.en: His face was covered in red blotches, seemingly a nasty case of acne.
sentences.cn: 他满脸红斑，像是起了很严重的粉刺。

sentences.en: Most people develop one of several forms of acne at some time in their lives.
sentences.cn: 大多数人一生中的不同时期会患不同类型的痤疮.

sentences.en: Objective : To study the acute and chronic toxicity of Ten - flavor - acne eradicating - capsule.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨复方中药合剂十味平 痤 胶囊的急性及慢性毒性.

sentences.en: Severe shock can bring on an attack of acne.
sentences.cn: 严重的惊吓会造成痤疮突发。

sentences.en: She wore no makeup, and her face was dotted with acne.
sentences.cn: 她没有化妆，脸上长满了粉刺。

sentences.en: The treatment has a whole host of extremely unpleasant side-effects including weight gain, acne, skin rashes and headaches.
sentences.cn: 这种疗法有许多令人非常不舒服的副作用，包括发胖、粉刺、皮疹和头痛。

sentences.en: They say eating too much may contribute to having acne , cavities, and weight problems.
sentences.cn: 他们说吃太多可能导致人们长青春痘 、 蛀牙和变重.

trans.tran_cn: <医>痤疮，粉刺，青春美丽痘，粉剌
trans.tran_en: a medical problem which causes a lot of red spots on your face and neck and mainly affects young people
